name: Swipe Quest (itch)
description:
Swipe Quest is a video game where grid puzzle concept meets random generation of adventures, epic storyline, rougelike elements and RPG mechanics.

Swipe to control your hero in the fantasy world.
When two tiles of the same type touch,
they merge into one with higher value!
Fight with monsters, get treasures, be the mighty hero!

Main features:
- grid puzzle with swiping
- different heroes to collect/unlock
- many kinds of monsters to defeat
- quest system with random elements
- simple and nice in use RPG stats
- original retro graphics and music

Swipe Quest game was inspired by the classic puzzle grid games like 2048, 1024 or threes! and it has unique random generation of adventures, EPIC (and funny :) ) storyline and RPG mechanics.

Game controls:
- Arrow keys and mouse :)
